levels.description:
Detonates all Robotters immediately, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Mayer's ATK as Arts damage to nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> all hits targets for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> second(s)
<@ba.rem>The exploded Robotters will be recycled</>
